name: I AM SOAP
description:
For the Mini Jam 84 I present you with....

I AM SOAP!

You play as a lovable soap bar, think of your favorite soap bar, maybe it's dial, maybe Ivory? Maybe some other soap bar, that this world was blessed with. The point is, this is who you are. YOU ARE SOAP! So defeat those Yuck Monsters and beat those levels! You'll be like a soaper hero.  But be careful, shooting bubbles from your robotic pants at the Yuck monsters to destroy them comes at a price, that price is you. Since you are Soap, you are also the bubbles... And the bubbles are  you...
